00010 /*
00011  \param Q quaternion to take conjugate of
00012  \param QResult Result of conjugation
00013  */
00014 void quatconj(const quaternion* Q, quaternion* QResult)
00015 {
00016   QResult->w = Q->w;
00017   QResult->x = -Q->x;
00018   QResult->y = -Q->y;
00019   QResult->z = -Q->z;
00020 
00021 }
